title: Udhyog Unity
description: UdhyogUnity is a platform dedicated to connecting cities through local businesses. Our mission is to empower local businesses and build stronger communities through digital transformation.

title: Pokedex React Fun Project
description: A React-based Pokédex project that integrates the PokéAPI to display comprehensive Pokémon data including stats, abilities, and types. The application emphasizes component reusability, efficient state management, and responsive UI design.

title: Real-Estate App
description: Created an advanced real estate full stack web application using Next.js and Babel. Integrated and customized APIs to fetch and display real-time property data, including listings, prices, and amenities, empowering users with comprehensive and up-to-date information.

title: Task Management App
description: Developed a PHP & MySQL Task Manager with full CRUD capability, handling task creation, modification, deletion, and display through dynamic PHP pages and structured database queries. Integrated frontend with server-side logic to deliver a functional productivity tool.

title: TerminalX - CLI Productivity Tool
description: A command-line interface tool built to automate repetitive developer tasks and manage local environments efficiently.
